## **Nicole Barbour**, Movement and Marine Ecology Ph.D. Candidate

Nicole is a 4th year Ph.D. candidate in the Bailey lab at the University of Maryland Center for Environmental Science (<https://www.umces.edu/helen-bailey>) and the Fagan lab at University of Maryland College Park (<http://science.umd.edu/biology/faganlab/index.html>). Her dissertation focuses on the movement ecology of sea turtles through different life stages.
